snippet.title: PENTOMINON (August 14, 2009)
snippet.description:
Official description: Block meets Sound. Each blocks on the matrix are make sound like a music sequencer. This game looks like classic falling block style game, different and special feature is "make a gap". If you make flowing block, you will get more score.

Developer:
xisai
Genre:
Puzzle & Trivia
Release Date:
August 14, 2009

Features:
HDTV 720p
Players: 1
